About

This site is fan-made and not affiliated with Rocket BEANS Entertainment GmbH in any way. RocketView is fully open source under GNU General Public License v2.0.

RocketView is optimised for the latest Firefox and Chrome browsers with a resolution of at least 600px width. It is not intended to be used on mobile devices.

Github Repository

RBTV Forum Thread

  • Alternative viewer for RocketbeansTV Youtube Live streams
  • Featuring a dark theme, program schedule, important links and easy access to the latest youtube videos (main and let's play channels). All this without the need to manually refresh something or opening new pages.

With a free developer account there are limitations on how many requests you can send to Google's APIs.

These limits affect the update intervals:

Type Interval (minutes) Quota Cost (units)
Update Video Lists {{intervals.refreshVideoListData / (1000 * 60)}} 400
Update Stream/Video Title {{intervals.updateStreamTitle / (1000 * 60)}} 3
  • BETTERRBTV for Youtube Live by pronuntiator (works with RocketView)
  • Youtube Alternative by misantronic

  • "thumb" icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY
